name: The Aldridge Games Table
description: Take your evening's entertainment to the next level with the prestigious Aldridge games table that celebrates both the best in British luxury design and the traditional pastimes of chess, backgammon, and card-playing. DAVIDSON brings a modern-day luxury to an ancient leisure activity with a table that feels timeless rather than traditional, and that offers the discerning homeowner the chance to inject an elite appeal into their room scheme.
